PROVENANCE:
Cambridge Created List 

Our original diabetes Read code list is taken from this paper:
10.1371/journal.pone.0179392 and was created and selected after comparison with other published lists.

Dr D Edwards and Dr Payne then created a sub-category of "diabetes with end organ damage" within the list to make it consistent with the Charlson definition.  This sub-categorisation will miss patients who have end organ damage not listed by Charlson, not coded, or who have the end organ damage coded seperately to their diabetes in all cases.
